name: Casino Poker
overview: A single-player, casino game for one created by Comp-U-Soft and released in 1993. There are 2 types of games included. In Casino Poker, you play a slot machine version of 5 Card Draw. You start off with 20 pints and lose or win points depending on your final hand. However after playing 15 hands it will get a bit harder and you'll need at least a pair of Jacks to win. In Draw Poker this is a one on one contest between you and the dealer. You can Call, Raise, Fold or Pass, but so can they. To reset discards push F1.
